The opal machete is a machete which cuts at a faster rate than a normal machete.

The opal machete can be obtained either from Gabooty's store with 600 trading sticks, looting a ninja impling, or bringing 300 trading sticks, 3 cut or uncut opals, and 1 gout tuber to Safta Doc in Tai Bwo Wannai. The opal machete can be used as a weapon but is primarily used to cut jungle in the Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup minigame. It has no requirements to wield though cutting light, medium, and dense jungle requires 10, 20, and 35 Woodcutting to harvest respectively.

Combat styles[edit | edit source]

LungeStabControlledAttack, Strength, Defence, and Hitpoints+1 Attack, Strength, and Defence
BlockSlashDefensiveDefence and Hitpoints+3 Defence

Notes[edit | edit source]

  • Having Safta Doc make the machete fulfils one of the Karamja Diary medium tasks.
  • Gout tubers are worth far more than the resultant opal machete. Therefore, it makes no sense to get one from Safta Doc except for the diary.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When resting from cutting back jungle, the wrist holding the machete seems to stretch and grow longer.

[[File:Opal machete detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''opal machete''' is a machete which cuts at a faster rate than a normal [[machete]].

The opal machete can be obtained either from [[Gabooty]]'s store with 600 [[trading sticks]], looting a [[ninja impling]], or bringing 300 trading sticks, 3 cut or uncut opals, and 1 [[gout tuber]] to [[Safta Doc]] in [[Tai Bwo Wannai]]. The opal machete can be used as a weapon but is primarily used to cut jungle in the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup]] [[minigame]]. It has no requirements to wield though cutting [[Light jungle|light]], [[Medium jungle|medium]], and [[dense jungle]] requires 10, 20, and 35 [[Woodcutting]] to harvest respectively.

==Notes==
*Having Safta Doc make the machete fulfils one of the [[Medium Karamja Diary|Karamja Diary medium tasks]].
*Gout tubers are worth far more than the resultant opal machete. Therefore, it makes no sense to get one from Safta Doc except for the diary.
